mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_REPLY (REPLYID, REPLYMAIN, USERID, BOARDID, COMMENTID, REPLYREGISTERDATE, REPLYUPDATEDATE) VALUES (#{replyId}, #{replyMain}, #{userId}, #{boardId}, #{commentId}, #{replyRegisterdate}, #{replyUpdatedate})
mapper.delete: SELETC * FROM T_REPLY ORDER BY REPLYID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE T_REPLY SET REPLYMAIN=#{replyMain} WHERE REPLYID=#{replyId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_REPLY ORDER BY SCRAPID DESC
